info.title: HealApp API
info.description: API для мобильной экосистемы HealApp - организации ухода за пожилыми людьми и людьми с ограниченными возможностями

get.summary: Get all alarms for a diary
get.description: Retrieve all alarms for a specific diary. Access is restricted based on user permissions.

message.example: You do not have access to this diary.

post.description: Create a new medication or vitamin alarm for a diary.

times.description: Times for the alarm (HH:MM format, max 4)

get.summary: Get a single alarm by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific alarm. Access is restricted based on user permissions.

patch.description: Toggle the active status of an alarm.

post.description: Register a new user with phone number and password. A verification code will be sent via SMS.

account_type.description: Account type: client, specialist, pansionat, or agency

organization_name.description: Organization name (optional, used for pansionat or agency)

post.description: Verify the user's phone number using the verification code sent via SMS. Returns an access token upon successful verification.

200.description: Phone verified successfully. Access token issued.

post.description: Authenticate user with phone and password. Returns an access token if credentials are valid and phone is verified.

401.description: Invalid credentials or phone not verified

message.example: Invalid credentials or phone not verified

post.description: Revoke the current access token for the authenticated user.

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user's information.

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile information (first_name, last_name, middle_name). All fields are optional - only provided fields will be updated.

post.description: Initiate a phone number change by providing a new phone number. A verification code will be sent to the new phone number.

phone.description: New phone number (must be unique and not already in use)

200.description: Confirmation code sent to new phone

message.example: Confirmation code sent to new phone

post.description: Confirm the phone number change by providing the verification code sent to the new phone number.

code.description: 4-digit verification code sent to the new phone number

message.example: Invalid verification code or no pending phone change request

get.summary: Get all diaries created by the authenticated user
get.description: Retrieve all diaries for patients created by the authenticated user. Access is restricted to user's own patients.

post.summary: Create diary entry or create diary for patient
post.description: Create a new diary entry for a patient. If diary doesn't exist, it will be created. Access is restricted to users who have access to the patient.

value.description: Entry value as JSON object. Examples: value 36.6 for temperature, systolic 120 diastolic 80 for blood pressure

message.example: You do not have access to this patient.

get.summary: Get a single diary by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific diary with patient info and entries. Access is restricted based on user permissions.

message.example: You do not have access to this diary.

post.summary: Create a new diary for a patient
post.description: Explicitly create a new diary for a patient with optional pinned parameters. Returns error if diary already exists.

message.example: You do not have access to this patient.
Diary already exists for this patient

patch.description: Update the pinned parameters with timers for a patient's diary.

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of notifications for the authenticated user.

post.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Mark all unread notifications for the authenticated user as read.

count.description: Number of notifications marked as read

get.description: Get the count of unread notifications for the authenticated user.
Retrieve all employees (users) belonging to the authenticated manager's organization.

403.description: Access denied - user is not a manager

message.example: You must be a manager to access this resource.

post.description: Create a new employee (doctor or caregiver) and assign them to the manager's organization. Returns a temporary password for testing.

password.description: Temporary password for testing (will be sent via SMS in production)

403.description: Access denied - user is not a manager

message.example: You must be a manager to invite employees.

post.summary: Assign a patient to an employee
post.description: Assign a patient to a caregiver or doctor. Both must belong to the same organization.

message.example: You do not have permission to assign patients.

422.description: Validation error or business logic error

message.example: Patient and employee must belong to the same organization.

patch.description: Update the organization's name, address, and/or phone. Only the manager (owner) can update.

403.description: Access denied - user is not a manager

message.example: You must be a manager to update the organization.
You do not have an organization.

get.description: Retrieve a list of patients. Clients see their own patients, managers see their organization's patients.

post.description: Create a new patient profile. Clients create personal patients, managers create organization patients.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific patient. Access is restricted to the creator or organization members.

message.example: You do not have access to this patient.

put.description: Update patient information. Access is restricted to the creator or organization members.

message.example: You do not have access to this patient.

delete.description: Delete a patient. Access is restricted to the creator or organization members.

message.example: You do not have access to this patient.

get.summary: Get route sheet (tasks) for a patient or current user
get.description: Get all tasks for a specific date. For caregivers in nursing homes, returns only tasks assigned to them.

parameters.name: patient_id
parameters.description: Patient ID (optional for caregivers who see only their assigned tasks)

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date to get tasks for (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

post.description: Create a one-time task directly to the route sheet
Move a task to a different time. Original time is preserved for history.
Complete a task with optional comment, photos, and measurement value

get.summary: Get current user's assigned tasks (for caregivers)
Get available employees for task assignment
get.description: Returns employees with their availability status for a specific time slot
Retrieve diary entries for a specific patient and key (e.g., temperature) over a time period. Returns data points for chart visualization.

message.example: patient_id and key parameters are required
You do not have permission to access this patient.

get.description: Retrieve task statistics for a patient on a specific date. Returns counts and completion rate.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date for statistics (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

message.example: You do not have permission to access this patient.

get.description: Retrieve tasks for a specific patient within a date range. Access is restricted based on user role.

parameters.name: from_date
parameters.description: Filter tasks from this date (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

parameters.name: to_date
parameters.description: Filter tasks to this date (YYYY-MM-DD). Defaults to today.

message.example: You do not have permission to access this patient.

patch.description: Update the status of a task. Caregivers can mark tasks as completed or missed. Comment is required when marking as missed. When completing a task with a measurement value, provide 'value' (JSON) and optionally 'completed_at' (actual completion time). If the task has a related_diary_key, a diary entry will be automatically created.

value.description: Measurement value (JSON). Required if task has related_diary_key and status is 'completed'. For blood_pressure: systolic and diastolic. For temperature: value field.

completed_at.description: Actual time when the task was completed (format: Y-m-d H:i:s). If not provided, uses current time.

message.example: You do not have permission to update this task.

get.summary: Get task templates for a patient
get.description: Retrieve task templates for a specific patient. Only clients and managers can access.

message.example: You do not have permission to access this patient.

post.description: Create a new task template and generate initial tasks. Only clients and managers can create templates.

days_of_week.description: Array of day numbers (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday). Null = every day

message.example: You do not have permission to create task templates.

delete.description: Delete a task template and all future pending tasks linked to it. Only clients and managers can delete templates.

message.example: You do not have permission to delete this template.
